description: A computer vision company focused on delivering AI solutions that elevate the global standard of care in dentistry.

funding.investors: Left Lane Capital, with participation from Smash Capital, Alpha Partners, Craft Ventures, and Neotribe Ventures
funding.raw: Pearl, a leader in dental AI, announced on July 24, 2024, that it raised $58 million in a Series B funding round. The investment was led by Left Lane Capital, with participation from Smash Capital, Alpha Partners, Craft Ventures, and Neotribe Ventures. This funding aims to accelerate the development and global access of Pearl's AI-powered dental solutions, enhancing patient care and diagnostic accuracy.

recent_news: After January 1st, 2025, Pearl Global Industries Limited operates across South Asia, Southeast Asia, and Central America. Pearl Group expanded its Nordic presence by acquiring Factors and operating as Pearl Denmark, establishing three offices. Pearl Group also achieved SAP PE SELL Partnership status, signed a PearlCare agreement with AJ Vaccines, partnered with Atea Logistics for SAP S/4HANA, and became the main SAP partner for Norwegian Defence for five years. They launched a new initiative in the Seafood industry with a tailored SAP solution. In terms of marketing and initiatives, Pearl Group expanded its annual Pearl Innovation Day to multiple cities and is increasing its focus on AI. Additionally, effective January 1, 2025, Ms. Carpenter became Chief Strategic Engagement Officer for a company associated with 'Pearl', as indicated by an SEC filing.

analysis.why_now: Yael Albek is first 90 days into their role—the window for new partnerships is open now but closes as they settle into existing vendor relationships. Recent news shows active company momentum (product launches, partnerships)—web presence needs to keep pace with business growth. They're early in their Webflow journey (2 projects)—now is the time to establish VAN as their go-to Webflow partner before they build internal muscle or find another agency.
analysis.why_van: VAN's deep Webflow expertise is directly relevant—they're already invested in the platform and need a partner who can help them maximize that investment. VAN's performance optimization capabilities directly address their 40/100 score—we can quantify the conversion impact and deliver measurable improvement. Multiple marketing stakeholders suggests a team that needs agency support—VAN's network model provides the breadth of expertise they need without managing multiple vendor relationships.
